title: न्यूज़ीलैंड में सभी मस्जिदों को बंद करने का आदेश? सोशल मीडिया में झूठा दावा वायरल
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
Live: PM says two minutes’ silence will be shared on Friday and call to prayer broadcast on TV and radio to honor Christchurch victims https://t.co/XKMnTmA39N

The police have asked all mosques nationally to shut their doors until further notice.

A Wellington-based imam says while mosques are closed, Muslims will be praying from the safety of their homes.https://t.co/ZewehpsuEJ
